Text: Just go home. Why did you come all the way here?
I don't want to be alone.
When I come here, Marco gives me a muffin too.
But the muffin is a bit stale.
We don't have a fridge here, so we only have food that can be stored for a long time.
You'll find it a bit stale to eat.
I want to eat fresh food...
I hope Dad comes back soon.
